properties.incident description:: A female student reported that at approximately 3:45 AM, an unknown male, who claimed to be a student living in the same building, entered the female's unsecured room, attempted to enter her bed, and asked to have sexual intercourse with her. The female screamed and the male left the apartment. Another female student reported that at approximately 4:30 AM, an unknown male entered her unsecured room in the same building, attempted to enter her bed, and asked to have sexual intercourse with her. The female declined the male's advances and he left.
properties.description of suspects::
Indian male
Medium to dark complexion
5'9" to 5'10" in height, 
150 to 175 pounds,
Wearing either short or long pants and a t-shirt.

properties.incident description:: A male Georgia Tech employee reported that at approximately 2:00 PM, he was approaching his vehicle that was parked on State Street between Tech Parkway and North Avenue, when an unknown male walked up to him and demanded his wallet. The employee refused to comply and the two males began to scuffle. The unknown male was able to remove the employee's dark blue or black rain jacket and fled the area on foot headed towards North Avenue.
properties.description of suspects::
Black male
Black hat
Red shirt
Tan pants
Yellow shoes

properties.incident description:: Two male Georgia Tech students parked their vehicle on Ethel Street, NW, near their home. One of the students entered the home, while the other stayed behind. The student that stayed behind noticed three suspicious males near the intersection of Ethel Street, NW and Terrell Street, NW near the Antico Pizza and McDonald's just off Hemphill Avenue, NW. The student walked towards the entrance of the house, looked back, and noticed the three males approaching him. One of the three males was armed with a black revolver. They forced the student in to the house. The three males tied both students up and stole electronics from the home. Both students were struck but were not seriously injured. The three males fled in one of the victim's vehicles, a dark blue 2011 Hyundai Sonata Turbo.
properties.description of suspects::
3 Black males
18-25 years old
Dark clothing
One suspect was wearing a dark blue hooded sweatshirt and dark blue pants

properties.incident description:: A male Georgia Tech student parked his vehicle on Hunnicutt Street, NW, near Centennial Olympic Park Drive, NW. As he was removing items from the back seat of his vehicle, he was struck in the back of the head by an unknown object. When he turned, he observed two males armed with handguns. One male pointed a handgun and demanded the student's property. The suspects saw an Atlanta Police Officer patrolling the area and fled on foot. They were last seen running northbound towards a parking lot in the Centennial Place Apartments complex. The student was not injured.
properties.description of suspects::
2 black males
18-20 years old
5'10"-6' tall
Average build
Both were wearing dark colored jackets, jeans, and dark colored shoes.
